title: How to Make a Clan on GameRanger

steps.headline: Start the Clan.
steps.description: Choose a name and a tag (example: Noobs Busters Clan, |NB|). The name can be anything you like, but the tag is usually a short version of the Clan name or just the starting letters of the words. You can add the tag at the beginning of your name or at the end (example: |NB|Paladin or TheKiller[TRF]).

steps.headline: Recruit.
steps.description: Get new Clan members and add them to your friends list. It's recommended to take entry tests before recruiting someone.

steps.headline: Get a Voice Chat server.
steps.description: A good recommended program is RaidCall (www.raidcall.com) due to it being free and its ease of use. Download and install Raidcall. Signup and login. Create a group with your Clan's name. Manage the rooms. For example, categorize your rooms with this template. Chat Rooms: Room for free chat. These are rather used to chat outside the game. Game Rooms: Rooms for gaming chat. These are used to chat inside the game. Make sure to make multiple game rooms. Admin Rooms: A room where the Clan's leaders make their conferences. Give away ranks and stars to members. Right click on the member in Raidcall and click on Edit Membership Name and give him or her a tag that shows the rank in the Clan. You could use this Template: [Trainee] [Clan Member] [Clan Pro Member] [Clan Founder] [Clan Administrator] [Clan Leader]. However, it's all up to you. Give administration permissions to leaders and administrators.

steps.headline: Get a website if possible.
steps.description: Using free website and forum hosts is a great idea.

steps.headline: Keep a list of your members in GameRanger.
steps.description: Click on the User tab in GameRanger and click on Find User. Then in the Nick section, search your tag and you will see a list of your clan members.

steps.headline: Challenge other Clans, and gain respect.
steps.description: Gather your members and ask other Clan leaders to fight your Clan.

steps.headline: Ally with other Clans.
steps.description: You can also merge your Clan with another to expand both Clans. This is not recommended, however.

steps.headline: Practice to improve your Clan skills.
